Name: Pink Tutu
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: A cocktail that's both bitter and sweet.
History: Created in 1999 by Dominique of Café Rouge, Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pink Tutu contains 197 calories
